title: How Fast Is the $4000 2018 MacBook Pro 15"?
description: The 2018 Apple MacBook Pro 15" brings a Core i9 and 4TB SSD but is it worth $4000? Building the Ultimate MacBook Pro:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
